title: AMA Fix Medicare Thank You Card
description: Card for AMA Fix Medicare Thank You campaign

variables.card_text_end: thank you for voting for H.R. 2. Repealing the SGR puts patient care first, and you came through for us!

variables.card_text_start: Thank you for listening to patients and physicians in
variables.card_text_end: — thank you for passing H.R. 2 and making SGR repeal happen!

variables.card_text_start: H.R. 2 passed and we couldn't have done it without you. Thank you for hearing the patients and physicians of

variables.card_text_end: are disappointed that you voted against H.R. 2. Thankfully, others in Congress put patient care first and passed this bill to repeal SGR!
